opinion.case_name: Dekalb Genetics Corp. v. Bayer Crop-Science, S. A

opinion:
538 U.S. 974

DEKALB GENETICS CORP.
v.
BAYER CROP-SCIENCE, S. A.

No. 02-130.

Supreme Court of United States.

April 21, 2003.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE FEDERAL CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. Fed. Cir. Certiorari granted, judgment vacated, and case remanded for further consideration in light of State Farm Mut. Automobile Ins. Co. v. Campbell, ante, p. 408. Reported below: 272 F. 3d 1335.
